title: sandEham En manamE
sahitya:
sandEham En manamE naTarAjan vandaruLvAn dinamE


anupallavi

  cintaiyai avanukkE cir-sabhai AkkuvAi dinakara jyOtiyAi manadil vandUkkuvAn


caraNam    antara OmkAram muzhanga avan ambor-silambaDi tazhanga
cintaiyil tEnmAri vazhanga sheida tIvinait-tunbangaL azhunga
tirut-toNDarukku tirut-toNDanAgavE karuttonri Aluvan niruttamiDum perumAn
